text: The Charge at Feather River, a 1953 Western movie directed by Gordon Douglas. It was originally released in 3D with many arrows, lances, and other weapons flying directly at the audience in several scenes. The movie is best known for creating and using the "Wilhelm scream". ==References== Category:1953 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Gordon Douglas
title: The Charge at Feather River
